title: Top Startup and Tech Funding News - November 20, 2025
description: It’s Thursday, November 20, 2025, and we’re back with the top startup and tech funding news stories across AI music generation, humanoid robotics, legal automation, enterprise finance systems, creator-economy infrastructure, agritech digitization, and next-generation language models. Momentum stretched across late-stage scale-ups and early-to-mid growth rounds, with capital flowing into companies building practical, revenue-driven platforms that
content:
Numeric Raises $51M Series B to Automate Accounting
Numeric, a San Francisco startup specializing in AI-powered accounting automation, has closed a $51 million Series B led by IVP, with participation from Menlo Ventures, Founders Fund, Alkeon, 8VC, S... [8146 chars]

title: Startup que “entiende videos como humanos” llega al Perú y lo proyecta como su hub regional
description: En un mercado donde las empresas buscan automatizar procesos críticos y obtener mayor visibilidad sobre lo que ocurre en sus operaciones, la analítica de video basada en inteligencia artificial se ha convertido en un elemento estratégico. La expansión de este tipo de soluciones se acelera a medida que organizaciones de distintos sectores enfrentan pérdidas por ineficiencias y requieren decisiones más rápidas. En ese contexto, Imaginario AI, una startup peruana que ha logrado insertarse en ecosistemas tecnológicos de alto nivel y trabajar con corporaciones internacionales, marca un nuevo hito al iniciar operaciones formales en su país de origen con una apuesta que combina expansión comercial y despliegue tecnológico.
content: En ese contexto, la startup de origen peruano, Imaginario AI, respaldada por Comcast y parte del programa NVIDIA Inception, comenzó su ingreso formal al mercado peruano con la presentación de Cetus 2.0, su motor de inteligencia artificial multimodal ... [5989 chars]

title: Palo Alto Networks acquires Chronosphere for $3.35B to expand its AI
description: Palo Alto Networks just made one of its biggest moves this year, agreeing to buy cloud observability startup Chronosphere for $3.35 billion. The deal signals a sharper push into AI-driven detection at a time when system failures and security blind spots can spread across an organization in minutes. description: OpenAI, the artificial intelligence startup whose recent restructuring created one of the world’s biggest philanthropic foundations, gave away $7.5 million through its nonprofit in 2024, most of which went to AI safety research.

title: Meta's AI Star Yann LeCun To Leave Zuckerberg's Company, Plans To Build His Own Startup
description: Yann LeCun to resign from Meta to build startup focused on advanced AI.
content: Meta’s long-time Chief Artificial Intelligence Scientist Yann LeCun has officially announced that he will leave the company after more than a decade of leading some of its most influential research efforts. The Turing Award laureate, widely regarded ... [2811 chars]

title: Tesla Stock Is Reeling Back Following Previous Gains: What's Going On?
description: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) shares are pulling back Thursday after the gains made following President Donald Trump's announcement of interest deductions for EV purchases, as part of the Big, Beautiful Bill. Additionally, Elon Musk's AI startup xAI has struck a major deal to build a Saudi-backed data center using Nvidia Corp chips.

title: Sony, Warner and Universal sign AI music licensing deals with startup Klay
description: AI-generated music has been flooding streaming services and there is a wave of AI singers and bands that don’t exist.
content: The world’s biggest music labels have struck AI licensing deals with a little-known startup named Klay Vision, the companies have said, the latest in a series of deals that underlines how the technology is shaking up the music industry’s business mod... [3207 chars]

title: Meta's Chief AI Scientist is leaving the company after 12 years to create a startup
description: Meta's Chief AI Scientist, who built the company's FAIR research arm, is leaving the company after over a decade — here's what is next.
content:

Meta's chief AI scientist is leaving the company at the end of this year to found a startup.
